poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Though pipped at the post the runner-up is a Loser. Losers should expect To be wiped out, picked off one By one, pimped out and pricked, however They had primped in finery prinked With gilded studs. Their cheeks Get pinched. Their words I will not Print not even in legal footnote Pitched for microscopes. Pissed on the eve Of someone else's battle, the penultimate Pict Squares up to the pit.
